title: Mentha Spicata El Corazón!
description: From the tippiest of toes,Down the well of my imagination,Or like my heart is a ship,and my mind is the storm,Follow me out the window,rounding corners of the soul,Finding deeper depths than darkness goes and words that onlyManaged to escape by hand.This is Mentha Spicata El Corazón!A collection of poems, journal entries, quips, pleasantries, retorts, and personal idioms for age sixteen to twenty six, arranged in days and moods.
author: Jesse Cale
